summary: Defines a scenario class that runs a comprehensive sensitivity analysis for postnatal care (PNC) simulations, managing parameter sampling, logging configuration details, and coordinating the required health modules within the TLO modeling framework.
business_intent: To assess how uncertainties in model parameters affect postnatal care outcomes, enabling researchers and policymakers to gauge the robustness of maternal and perinatal health interventions and inform evidenceâ€‘based decisions.
